info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A period of snow and sleet expected this evening...changing to a mix of rain and freezing rain through midnight... Snow and sleet has moved into the Capital Region, Rensselaer Plateau, southern Vermont and Berkshires, occasionally moderate at times. An inch or less of snow is expected through this evening, especially on grassy surfaces and untreated surfaces. Precipitation will change to sleet and rain around midnight. There could also be a brief period of freezing rain before changing to rain around midnight as temperatures rise into the mid 30s. Motorists are advised to slow down and allow extra distance between yourself and others.
